item.title: What I wish to know about health, money and time
item.description: An average person has a lifespan of 72 years. It might sound quite long, but in practise, how much of it can we truely use? I’ll touch in that article about the 3 principles that, I believe, are keys to understand to make the most of our life: Money, Free Time and Health. All 3 increase or decline the more we age. They are also strongly correlated to each other.
